graph_title: 국가생물다양성전략 목표가 2011-2020 생물다양성전략계획의 아이치목표2를 반영하는가의 여부
indicator_name: (a) 생물다양성 증진을 위한 아이치목표 타겟2에 따라 국가 차원의 목표를 수립한 국가의 수와 그 목표에 따른 보고 진전도 (b) 환경경제계정 구현을 위한 국가 회계 및 보고 시스템과 생태다양성의 통합
target_name: 2020년까지 생태계 및 생물다양성 가치를 국가 및 지역 계획․개발 과정 그리고 빈곤퇴치 전략 및 회계에 반영

en.title: Progress towards national targets established in accordance with Aichi Biodiversity Target 2 of the Strategic Plan for Biodiversity 2011-2020
en.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 456kB)
en.indicator_name: (a) Number of countries that have established national targets in accordance with or similar to Aichi Biodiversity Target 2 of the Strategic Plan for Biodiversity 2011-2020 in their National Biodiversity Strategy and Action Plans(NBSAP) and the progress reported towards these targets; (b) Integration of biodiversity into national accounting and reporting systems, defined as implementation of the System of Environmental-Economic Accounting
en.target: By 2020, integrate ecosystem and biodiversity values into national and local planning, development processes, poverty reduction strategies and accounts
en.graph_title: Progress towards national targets established in accordance with Aichi Biodiversity Target 2 of the Strategic Plan for Biodiversity 2011-2020
en.page_content: ▶ Data type: Estimated data by international organizations (Type2) This is Korean data prepared by international organizations through estimation and modeling. If there are no national data corresponding to UN SDGs indicators, international data are available for monitoring.
